name: The Boot Sequence
message: You’ve begun your journey with no expectations. Embrace the unknown.
reversedMessage: You’re stuck in setup—afraid to start, afraid to fail. Just boot.

name: The Fullstack
message: All tools are at your fingertips. You create your own destiny.
reversedMessage: Too many tools, not enough vision. Focus your flow.

name: The Intuition
message: Look within the docs—and within yourself. The answer is subtle.
reversedMessage: You’re overthinking. The silence is speaking—but you’re not listening.

name: The UI Flow
message: Beauty, creativity, and care make users feel seen.
reversedMessage: Pixel-perfect, but soulless. Design needs heart, not just polish.

name: The System Design
message: Order. Structure. Stability. Trust the blueprint.
reversedMessage: Rigid plans block innovation. Structure needs space to breathe.

name: The Documentation
message: Truth must be passed on. Your notes are a blessing to others.
reversedMessage: Lost knowledge. You’re hoarding wisdom others need.

name: The Merge Conflict
message: You may feel pulled in two directions. Realign your branches.
reversedMessage: Avoiding hard decisions. Now your branches are breaking.

name: The Product Launch
message: Charge ahead. The build passed, the release is live.
reversedMessage: Sloppy release. What you rushed may roll back.

name: The Debugger
message: Patience and courage reveal even the deepest issues.
reversedMessage: You’re fighting symptoms, not roots. Breathe, then dig deeper.

name: The Legacy Code
message: Isolation brings clarity. Read what others left behind.
reversedMessage: You're avoiding unfamiliar patterns. Wisdom waits in the old ways.

name: Stack Overflow
message: Answers come and go. Ask the right question, and luck may shine.
reversedMessage: You’re copying blindly. Trust your understanding—not just the top comment.

name: The Linter
message: Your code reveals your values. Style reveals your soul.
reversedMessage: Inconsistency breeds chaos. It’s time to clean up your act.

name: The Refactor
message: Let go of ego. Pause, restructure, and find elegance in stillness.
reversedMessage: You're resisting change. The mess will only grow.

name: The Rewrite
message: A major end births a better beginning. Do not fear the rebuild.
reversedMessage: You're clinging to broken systems. Let go and make room.

name: The Test Suite
message: Integration, harmony, preparation. Don’t rush what deserves care.
reversedMessage: Skipping tests will cost you. Slow down to build strong.

name: The Burnout
message: Obsession turns passion to poison. You must rest to grow.
reversedMessage: You're ignoring the warning signs. Step away before you break.

name: The Prod Crash
message: Everything broke. It’s not the fall that matters—it’s the fix.
reversedMessage: You're in denial. Accept what failed and rebuild wisely.

name: The Feature Request
message: Hope lives in feedback. The future glows with potential.
reversedMessage: You’re chasing every suggestion. Clarity is being lost.

name: The Impostor
message: The shadow speaks. You’re more than the doubts whispering in you.
reversedMessage: You let doubt paralyze you. Reclaim your inner truth.

name: The Light Theme
message: Joy, clarity, simplicity. Bask in the beauty of clean design.
reversedMessage: You’re hiding behind complexity. Simplicity wants to shine through.

name: The Code Review
message: You’re being seen. Accept feedback with grace—and pass it on.
reversedMessage: You fear being wrong. Vulnerability is strength, not flaw.

name: The Deployment
message: The cycle completes. What you’ve built now lives. Celebrate and reflect.
reversedMessage: You can’t move on because you’re clinging to unfinished work.
